column4: alright so i'm stumped. i am using the wiki instructions to install the ATI drivers on my laptop. the dialog to pick Ubuntu 5.10 to do a custom distro install stretches beyond my screen and i can't click on continue. :(
ever think of  holding down left alt and  left mouse button to move the whole screen ?
i remember finding that little jewl several years ago.    you'll never forget it now :)
